ygData.subject: Rondo's Tongue
ygData.msgSnippet: A couple of weeks ago I posted about a named npc, a dwarven bandit from the Crushbone slave camps named Rondo.  In fighting him, I was able to loot the
ygData.messageBody:
A couple of weeks ago I posted about a named npc, a dwarven bandit from the
Crushbone slave camps named Rondo. In fighting him, I was able to loot the
tongue(?!?) from the body, but I wasn't able to find the quest that it
belonged to. Since then, I've heard a rumor that it belongs to a clerics
guild quest - probably in Kaladin. Again this is just a rumor, I haven't
had a chance to verify it (damn you, George Lucus! =).

-Pennaggolan, High Elf Wizard of
the Third Circle in Felwithe
